body.p: Modus operandi of message window is similar to Bus statistics or logger modules. Here also the general functional part and the vehicle standard specific routines are grouped asunder, into non-cohesive units. From deployment viewpoint the general functional sub-module resides within the application whereas the data formatting routines are realised in a DLL called PSDI_<BUS>.
